text: William Houlder (born March 11, 1967 in Thunder Bay, Ontario, Canada) is a Canadian retired professional ice hockey defenceman. In his NHL career, Houlder appeared in 846 games. He scored 59 goals and added 191 assists. ==Career statistics== Regular season Playoffs Season Team League GP G A Pts PIM GP G A Pts PIM 1984–85 North Bay Centennials OHL 66 4 20 24 37 8 0 0 0 2
